attributes.action: WE ask for a further referendum to accept the deal or no deal, to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Mervyn King (previously head of the Bank of England) has stated that a "no deal" will do us no harm.  Nigel Farage has stated that further attempts to broker further deals with the EU will always be difficult, so let us leave now.  Tim Martin (CEO of Weatherspoons) has stated that we are able to sustain ourselves with our own products.
We are British we always find a way!
attributes.background: Having observed the many heated debates in Parliament, the lack of indicative votes giving no direction in how to take matters forward, the truculent action of the speaker in deliberately obfuscating the process, we believe the decision for deal or no deal must be placed in the people's hands.
